newsitem.title: CANADA: Bre-X shares resume trading at C$2.95.
newsitem.headline: Bre-X shares resume trading at C$2.95.

text.p: Shares in Bre-X Minerals Ltd resumed trading on Tuesday up 0.45 at 2.95 on the Toronto Stock Exchange.
On Nasdaq, the stock was up 1/4 at 2.
TSE volume exploded, spiking to more than two million shares in the first four minutes of trade.

Minutes before the resumption of trade, Bre-X issued a statement which said it will need more time to study a report from Kilborn SNC Lavalin containing data related to a check assay program at the Busang gold project.
